poemsDataJson.list_full: 心(こころ)あてに 折(を)らばや折(を)らむ 初霜(はつしも)の 置(お)きまどはせる 白菊(しらぎく)の花(はな)
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If it were my wish//To pick the white chrysanthemums,//Puzzled by the frost//Of the early autumn time,//I by chance might pluck the flower.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Kokoro ate ni|Ora baya oran|Hatsu-shimo no|Oki madowaseru|Shira-giku no hana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: おきまとはせる しらきくのはな
poemsDataJson.author: 凡河内躬恒(おおしこうちのみつね)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 初霜にまぎれるばかりの白菊の清楚な美しさ
